# Dataset Datatable Dataview Docs

## DataSet and XmlDataDocument Synchronization

- [DataSet and XmlDataDocument Synchronization](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/dataset-and-xmldatadocument-synchronization.md): Learn more about: DataSet and XmlDataDocument Synchronization
- [Synchronizing a DataSet with an XmlDataDocument](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/synchronizing-a-dataset-with-an-xmldatadocument.md): Learn more about: Synchronizing a DataSet with an XmlDataDocument
- [Performing an XPath Query on a DataSet](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/performing-an-xpath-query-on-a-dataset.md): Learn more about: Performing an XPath Query on a DataSet
- [Applying an XSLT Transform to a DataSet](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/applying-an-xslt-transform-to-a-dataset.md): Learn more about: Applying an XSLT Transform to a DataSet

## DataSets, DataTables, and DataViews

- [DataSets, DataTables, and DataViews](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/index.md): Learn several ways to work with an ADO.NET DataSet, a memory-resident representation of data that provides a consistent relational programming model.
- [Security guidance](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/security-guidance.md): Learn more about: DataSet and DataTable security guidance
- [Creating a DataSet](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-a-dataset.md): Learn more about: Creating a DataSet
- [Adding a DataTable to a DataSet](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-a-datatable-to-a-dataset.md): Refer to this example code to learn how to create DataTable objects and add them to an existing DataSet in ADO.NET.
- [Adding DataRelations](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-datarelations.md): Learn more about: Adding DataRelations
- [Navigating DataRelations](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/navigating-datarelations.md): Learn more about: Navigating DataRelations
- [Merging DataSet Contents](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/merging-dataset-contents.md): Learn more about: Merging DataSet Contents
- [Copying DataSet Contents](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/copying-dataset-contents.md): Learn more about: Copying DataSet Contents
- [Handling DataSet Events](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/handling-dataset-events.md): Learn more about: Handling DataSet Events
- [Consuming a DataSet from an XML Web Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/consuming-a-dataset-from-an-xml-web-service.md): Learn more about: Consume a DataSet from an XML web service

## DataTable Schema Definition

- [DataTable Schema Definition](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datatable-schema-definition.md): Learn more about: DataTable Schema Definition
- [Adding Columns to a DataTable](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-columns-to-a-datatable.md): A DataTable contains DataColumn objects referenced by the Columns property of the table. Use this example code to add columns to a table in ADO.NET.
- [Creating Expression Columns](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-expression-columns.md): Learn more about: Creating Expression Columns
- [Creating AutoIncrement Columns](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-autoincrement-columns.md): Learn more about: Creating AutoIncrement Columns
- [Defining Primary Keys](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/defining-primary-keys.md): Learn more about: Defining Primary Keys
- [DataTable Constraints](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datatable-constraints.md): Learn more about: DataTable Constraints

## DataTableReaders

- [DataTableReaders](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datatablereaders.md): Learn more about: DataTableReaders
- [Creating a DataReader](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-a-datareader.md): Learn more about: Creating a DataReader
- [Navigating DataTables](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/navigating-datatables.md): Learn more about: Navigating DataTables

## DataTables

- [DataTables](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datatables.md): Learn about an ADO.NET DataTable, which represents one table of in-memory relational data, local to the .NET-based application where it resides.
- [Creating a DataTable](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-a-datatable.md): Learn to create a DataTable in ADO.NET, which represents one table of in-memory relational data, to use independently or by other .NET Framework objects.
- [Handling DataTable Events](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/handling-datatable-events.md): Learn more about: Handling DataTable Events

## DataViews

- [DataViews](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/dataviews.md): Learn more about: DataViews
- [Creating a DataView](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-a-dataview.md): Learn more about: Creating a DataView
- [Sorting and Filtering Data](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/sorting-and-filtering-data.md): Learn more about: Sorting and Filtering Data
- [DataRows and DataRowViews](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datarows-and-datarowviews.md): Learn more about: DataRows and DataRowViews
